channel.title: Drop Rates?
channel.description: Alright, so I just added Nex and people go to kill him and like every drop is torva or vitrus or something good. So I wanted to change this i go into npcdrops.tsm and i tryed to find nex in it his npc id is 2636. So I search that up but it isn't in there. Yet he is still dropping where should i look to change this? I really need help.

item.title: Drop Rates?
item.dc:creator: @Lucas7 Lucas7
item.description:
@Lucas7 wrote:

Yeah, that is not nex’s ID nex has many ID’s for many stages but the main ID you want to use is:

13447

That is Nex.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Rates?
item.dc:creator: @ClairtyX ClairtyX
item.description:
@ClairtyX wrote:

I searched up the id for torva body, yet it’s not in there… If it’s id isn’t 2636 what is it?

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Rates?
item.dc:creator: @T7S T7S
item.description:
@T7S wrote:

NpcConsistants.TSM should work, and normally, nex isn’t 2636…
